attributes.action: prevent British athletes from competing in the Beijing Olympics, and prevent Chinese athletes from competing in the London Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How can this country just sit here and take no action while innocent people are suffering at the hands of the Chinese government?
The chinese olympics will generate BILLIONS of pounds for the chinese economic system, therefore allowing our athletes to compete here is funding the cruelty towards chinese civilians, including but not limited to - the mass public shootings of prisoners in football stadiums, the wages of the soldiers who are abusing the innocent tibetan monks, civil servants who rape women from tribes, and more disgusting crimes equal to those commited by the Nazis.
We can stop this, we can save more lives.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
